title: Youtube weirdness
content:
Hey I'm getting weird behavior with youtube see the screenshot the progress bar is appearing at the top of the video anyone got an answer or fix 
don't know if it's connected but I've had some very strange behavior with my phone I had drive uploading multiple files for no apparent reason google photos was giving constant notification with no notification in the notification drop down menu bitdefender when nuts not allowing me to unlock apps I did some googling and found a similar problem with desktop computers in windows removed my google account then added my account again pixel support were useless hope there isn't a bigger problem anyway if anyone has an answer I'd glad of it
